Account Rest APIÂ¶

Overview

Resource Operation Description
Account GET /accounts/ List all accounts.
AccountLimits GET /accounts/(account)/limits/(rse) Get account limits.
  GET /accounts/(account)/limits  
AccountParameter PUT /accounts/(account) Update account information.
  POST /accounts/(account) Add account.
  GET /accounts/(account) Get account parameters.
  DELETE /accounts/(account) Delete account information.
Attributes POST /accounts/(account)/attr/(key) Add account attribute
  GET /accounts/(account)/attr list account attributes.
  DELETE /accounts/(account)/attr/(key) Delete account attribute
Identities POST /accounts/(account)/identities Add identity to account.
  GET /accounts/(account)/identities Get account idenitity mapping.
  DELETE /accounts/(account)/identities Remove identity from account.
Rules GET /accounts/(account)/rules Get rules for account.
Scope POST /accounts/(account)/scopes/(scope) Add to account.
Scopes GET /accounts/(account)/scopes List scope for account.
Usage1 GET /accounts/(account)/usage Get account usage.
Usage2 GET /accounts/(account)/usage/(rse) Get account usage for RSE.

Details

GET /accounts/Â¶

list all rucio accounts.

Response Headers:
 
  • Content-Type â application/x-json-stream
Status Codes:
  • 200 OK â OK.
  • 401 Unauthorized â Invalid auth token.
  • 500 Internal Server Error â Database exception
Returns:

A list containing all account names as dict.
POST /accounts/(account)/identitiesÂ¶

Grant an identity access to an account.

Parameters:
  • account â Account identifier.
Request JSON Object:
 
  • identity (string) â The identity name.
  • authtype (string) â The auth type of the identity.
  • email (string) â The email address.
Status Codes:
  • 201 Created â Successfully added.
  • 400 Bad Request â Parameter missing.
  • 401 Unauthorized â Invalid auth token.
  • 409 Conflict â Already exists.
  • 404 Not Found â Account not found.
  • 500 Internal Server Error â Database exception.
GET /accounts/(account)/identitiesÂ¶

Get all identities mapped to an account.

Response Headers:
 
  • Content-Type â application/x-json-stream
Parameters:
  • account â The account identifier.
Status Codes:
  • 200 OK â OK.
  • 401 Unauthorized â Invalid auth token.
  • 404 Not Found â Account not found.
  • 500 Internal Server Error â Database exception
Returns:

Line separated dicts of identities.
DELETE /accounts/(account)/identitiesÂ¶

Delete an accountâs identity mapping.

Parameters:
  • account â Account identifier.
Request JSON Object:
 
  • identity (string) â The identity name.
  • authtype (string) â The authentication type.
Status Codes:
  • 200 OK â Successfully deleted.
  • 401 Unauthorized â Invalid auth token.
  • 404 Not Found â Account not found.
  • 404 Not Found â Identity not found.
  • 500 Internal Server Error â Database exception.
POST /accounts/(account)/scopes/(scope)Â¶

create scope with given scope name.

Parameters:
  • account â The account identifier.
  • scope â The scope to be added.
Status Codes:
  • 201 Created â Successfully added.
  • 401 Unauthorized â Invalid auth token.
  • 404 Not Found â Account not found.
  • 409 Conflict â Scope already exists.
  • 500 Internal Server Error â Database exception.
GET /accounts/(account)/scopesÂ¶

list all scopes for an account.

Parameters:
  • account â The account identifier.
Response Headers:
 
  • Content-Type â application/x-json-stream
Status Codes:
  • 200 OK â OK.
  • 401 Unauthorized â Invalid auth token.
  • 404 Not Found â Account not found.
  • 404 Not Found â Scope not found.
  • 500 Internal Server Error â Database exception.
Returns:

A list containing all scope names for an account.
GET /accounts/(account)/limits/(rse)Â¶
GET /accounts/(account)/limitsÂ¶

get the current limits for an account on a specific RSE

Parameters:
  • account â The account name.
  • rse â The rse name.
Response Headers:
 
  • Content-Type â application/json
Status Codes:
  • 200 OK â OK.
  • 401 Unauthorized â Invalid auth token.
  • 404 Not Found â RSE not found.
  • 500 Internal Server Error â Database exception
Returns:

JSON dict containing informations about the requested user.
GET /accounts/(account)/usage/(rse)Â¶

Return the account usage of the account.

Parameters:
  • account â The account name.
  • rse â The rse.
Response Headers:
 
  • Content-Type â application/x-json-stream
Status Codes:
  • 200 OK â OK.
  • 401 Unauthorized â Invalid auth token.
  • 404 Not Found â Account not found.
  • 404 Not Found â RSE not found.
  • 500 Internal Server Error â Database exception.
Returns:

Line separated list of account usages.
GET /accounts/(account)/rulesÂ¶

Return all rules of a given account.

Parameters:
  • scope â The scope name.
Response Headers:
 
  • Content-Type â application/x-json-stream
Status Codes:
  • 200 OK â OK.
  • 401 Unauthorized â Invalid auth token.
  • 404 Not Found â Rule not found.
  • 500 Internal Server Error â Database exception.
Returns:

Line separated list of rules.
GET /accounts/(account)/usageÂ¶

Return the account usage of the account.

Parameters:
  • account â The account name.
Response Headers:
 
  • Content-Type â application/x-json-stream
Status Codes:
  • 200 OK â OK.
  • 401 Unauthorized â Invalid auth token.
  • 404 Not Found â Account not found.
  • 500 Internal Server Error â Database exception.
Returns:

Line separated list of account usages.
POST /accounts/(account)/attr/(key)Â¶

Add attributes to an account.

Parameters:
  • account â Account identifier.
  • key â The attribute key.
Request JSON Object:
 
  • key (string) â The attribute key.
  • value (string) â The attribute value.
Status Codes:
  • 201 Created â Successfully created.
  • 401 Unauthorized â Invalid auth token.
  • 409 Conflict â Attribute already exists.
  • 404 Not Found â Account not found.
  • 500 Internal Server Error â Database Exception.
GET /accounts/(account)/attrÂ¶

list all attributes for an account.

Parameters:
  • account â The account identifier.
Response Headers:
 
  • Content-Type â application/json
Status Codes:
  • 200 OK â OK
  • 401 Unauthorized â Invalid auth token.
  • 404 Not Found â Account not found.
  • 500 Internal Server Error â Database Exception.
Returns:

JSON dict containing informations about the requested account.
DELETE /accounts/(account)/attr/(key)Â¶

Remove attribute from account.

Parameters:
  • account â Account identifier.
  • key â The attribute key.
Status Codes:
  • 200 OK â Successfully deleted.
  • 401 Unauthorized â Invalid auth token.
  • 404 Not Found â Account not found.
  • 500 Internal Server Error â Database Exception.
PUT /accounts/(account)Â¶

update the status for a given account name

Parameters:
  • account â The account identifier.
Status Codes:
  • 200 OK â OK.
  • 400 Bad Request â Unknown status.
  • 401 Unauthorized â Invalid auth token.
  • 404 Not Found â Account not found.
  • 500 Internal Server Error â Database exception.
POST /accounts/(account)Â¶

create account with given account name.

Parameters:
  • account â The account identifier.
Request JSON Object:
 
  • type (string) â The account type.
  • email (string) â The account email.
Status Codes:
  • 201 Created â Successfully created.
  • 401 Unauthorized â Invalid auth token.
  • 409 Conflict â Account already exists.
  • 500 Internal Server Error â Database exception.
GET /accounts/(account)Â¶

get account parameters for given account name.

Parameters:
  • account â The account identifier.
Status Codes:
  • 200 OK â OK.
  • 401 Unauthorized â Invalid auth token.
  • 404 Not Found â Account not found.
  • 500 Internal Server Error â Database exception.
Returns:

JSON dict containing informations about the requested user.
DELETE /accounts/(account)Â¶

disable account with given account name.

Parameters:
  • account â The account identifier.
Status Codes:
  • 200 OK â OK.
  • 401 Unauthorized â Invalid auth token.
  • 404 Not Found â Account not found.
  • 500 Internal Server Error â Database exception.
